data.eml:eml: A new Bifidocoelotes species, with the description of the male of B. primus from Hong Kong, China (Agelenidae: Coelotinae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Zhou, Yan-Chen, Yuen, Yan Ling, Zhang, Zhi-Sheng (2017): A new Bifidocoelotes species, with the description of the male of B. primus from Hong Kong, China (Agelenidae: Coelotinae). Zootaxa 4232 (3): 429-436, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4232.3.11
